Projects

Study With Japan

A dummy brochure site showcasing web development apptitude. The Study With Japan site offers opportunity to study Japanese culture.

Breath of the Wild Character Quiz

The user will answer a selection of questions. Once submitted, the points will be calculated & the user redirected to a page with the given character.

To-Do List

A to do list site that can hold up to 10 items. The list allows the user to view, edit, create, or delete any items on the list with a simple click of the button!

About

My name is Kenyon Huppe. I am currently based in Olympia Washington in which I have lived for the majority of my life. In my spare time, I like to work on personal programming projects as well as biking or drawing. I look forward to working with you!
